sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_275773_sta_cicd_cicd_install_apps"> <x_275773_sta_cicd_cicd_install_apps action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <app_id>7e0aa9ed8755101047d84c2c59cb0b1a</app_id> <category>agile</category> <comments>Work Progress Status for Agile Teams provides a GYR (green, yellow, red) progress status on Agile 2.0 Epics to indicate whether the work is likely to be completed by the Epic's planned end date. It also provides an estimated completion date based on the rates at which the scope of work is changing, and the work is being completed.</comments> <install_key>7e0aa9ed8755101047d84c2c59cb0b1a</install_key> <name>Work Progress Status for Agile Teams (sn_scrum_progress)</name> <number>CICD0001140</number> <status>not_required</status> <sys_created_by>wzbsza</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-07-16 08:34:24</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b8833ba797dfc214b4b27ca0f053afcc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>wzbsza</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-07-16 08:34:24</sys_updated_on> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.2</version> </x_275773_sta_cicd_cicd_install_apps> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Work Progress Status for Agile Teams (sn_scrum_progress)
